user.description: Ensure that your TV is turned on before trying to set it up.

authorize.title: Authorize Sony Bravia TV
authorize.description:
Enter the PIN code shown on the Sony Bravia TV. 

If the PIN code is not shown, you have to unregister Home Assistant on your TV, go to: Settings -> Network -> Remote device settings -> Unregister remote device.

error.unsupported_model: Your TV model is not supported.

abort.no_ip_control: IP Control is disabled on your TV or the TV is not supported.
